sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Old Wyk was the first of the islands to be settled (despite being located on the far side of the archipelago from the mainland), and the [[ironborn]] still hold it to be sacred.
sections.TOP: Old Wyk0134065hb2afih2vamzu3rn8zl0a11a2caq7w1207882014-03-29T02:06:17ZGreater good3347453'''Old Wyk''' is one of the seven main [[Iron Islands]], an archipelago located on [[Ironman's Bay]], on the western side of [[Westeros]].
